basics.outline: A cinematic journey through a rainy, neon-lit city at night. The protagonist walks alone, not in sadness but in supreme confidence. The city is cold, but she is the warm center. The 'Castlevania' is her high-rise apartment overlooking the chaos.
basics.shooting_method: Slow tracking shots, shallow depth of field (bokeh city lights), smooth gimbal movements to match the groovy bass. Low key lighting with neon accents (cyan and magenta).
basics.art_style_description: Cinematic Realism, Wong Kar-wai inspired, moody, high contrast, wet pavement reflections, velvet textures.

prompts.first_frame: Cinematic shot, medium close-up, elegant woman sitting by a rain-streaked window at night, city lights bokeh in background, neo-soul vibe, warm rhodes piano atmosphere, moody lighting, 8k resolution.
prompts.last_frame: Woman standing up, silhouette against the city window, dropping a heavy winter coat, confident posture, red light highlighting her profile, urban night aesthetic.

storyboard.content_narrative: [Chorus] She enters her 'throne room' (a stylized living space). She sits on a velvet armchair. The lighting shifts to warm gold and deep purple. She looks directly at the camera, regal.

prompts.first_frame: Wide shot, modern luxury apartment interior, dark velvet armchair as a throne, purple and gold ambient lighting, protagonist walking towards the chair, sophisticated atmosphere.
prompts.last_frame: Close-up, protagonist sitting on the velvet chair, regal expression, looking into camera, soft rim lighting, 'King of the Night' vibe, smooth jazz aesthetic.

storyboard.content_narrative: [Verse 2 - Male Rap] The camera pans to a mirror or reflection where we see the 'Male' persona (the King) rapping. He is cool, relaxed, maybe smoking or holding a drink. The female protagonist vibes with him in the reflection.

prompts.first_frame: Over-the-shoulder shot, looking into a large ornate mirror, reflection shows a stylish man in a suit instead of the woman, sultry vibe, low light, smoke swirling.
prompts.last_frame: Split composition, real world woman and mirror reflection man vibing to the beat, duality, self-reconciliation, groovy atmosphere, warm electric piano colors.

storyboard.content_narrative: [Outro] The camera pulls back out of the window, showing the building standing tall like a modern castle in the city. The lights go out slowly.

prompts.first_frame: Exterior shot, camera pulling back from the window, rain falling, the apartment is a warm glowing box in a cold blue city.
prompts.last_frame: Wide cityscape, one tall building stands out like a fortress, 'Castlevania' text overlay in elegant serif font, screen fades to black.
